## What's the Output?

```{.cpp} 
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

double calculateArea(double radius);

int main() {
    double radius = 5.0;
    double area = calculateArea(radius);
    
    cout << "Radius: " << radius << endl;
    cout << "Area: " << area << endl;
    
    double newRadius = 3.0;
    cout << "New area: " << calculateArea(newRadius) << endl;
    
    return 0;
}

double calculateArea(double radius) {
    return 3.14 * radius * radius;
}
```
